name: Penguin Jester
text: FLIP: "Penguin" monsters you currently control cannot be destroyed by card effects this turn. If this card is sent to the GY for the Summon of a "Penguin" monster: You can return 1 card your opponent controls to the hand. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 level 3 or lower "Penguin'' monster from your GY in face-up or face-down Defense position.
